casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dammion Lamont MARTIN. No. 226P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 6, 2015. Jarvis John Edgerton, IV, for Martin, Dammion Lamont. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of July 2015 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of July 2015."
